Aug. 2, 2014 D National Eisteddfod of Wales (Third Section)
National Eisteddfod of Wales (Third Section) 30 Entertainments Contest National Eisteddfod of Wales national-eisteddfod-of-wales-third-section
Festival Fields, Millennium Coastal Park, Llanelli, Carmarthenshire Own choice for no longer than 15 minutes and with a minimum of three items.
Prizes: 1. Cwpan Ivor Jarvis to be held for a year and £400 (Ymddiriedolaeth James Pantyfedwen) 2. £300 (£150 Côr Meibion Llandybïe; £150 Cyngor Cymuned Llanfihangel Rhos-y-Corn) 3. £200 (Cymdeithas Cymrodorion Porth Tywyn a Phenbre)
Sponsored by TAD Builders Ltd.
